public static final byte TYPE_EC_FP_POINT

Constant Field Values

TYPE_EC_FP_POINT_CLEAR_ON_DESELECT

public static final byte TYPE_EC_FP_POINT_CLEAR_ON_DESELECT
TYPE_EC_FP_POINT_CLEAR_ON_DESELECT creates an ECPoint object in RAM. The object is cleared when the applet is deselected.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TYPE_EC_FP_POINT_CLEAR_ON_RESET

public static final byte TYPE_EC_FP_POINT_CLEAR_ON_RESET
TYPE_EC_FP_POINT_CLEAR_ON_RESET creates an ECPoint object in RAM. The object is cleared on reset.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

ECPointBuilder

Method Detail

buildECPoint

public static ECPoint buildECPoint(byte keyType,
                                   short keyLength)
Creates uninitialized ECPoint object for arithmetic operations over finite fields GF(p).

Parameters:
keyType - the type of key to be generated. Valid codes listed in TYPE.. constants.
keyLength - the key size in bits. The valid key bit lengths are key type dependent. Some common key lengths are listed above above in the LENGTH_.. constants.
Returns:
ECPoint object instance of the requested key type and length.
Throws:
CryptoException - with the following reason codes:
  • CryptoException.NO_SUCH_ALGORITHM if the requested algorithm associated with the specified type, size of key and key encryption interface is not supported.
